quote: I want to hire someone who will show up late and leave early.
author: No Employer Ever

quote: A. B. T. - Always Be Testing.
author: Troy Finamore

quote: Don't Make Me Think.
author: Steve Krug

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it!
author: Alan Kay

quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: One eye sees, the other feels.
author: Paul Klee

quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I wouldn't have seen it if I hadn't believed it.
author: Marshal McLuhan

quote: There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: Don't you have work to do?
author: Dave Mauriello

quote: If I could spell... I would be dangerous.
author: Jervis Thompson

quote: Geek hard...Geek often.
author: Jervis Thompson

quote: Don't stop when you're tired, stop when you're finished.
author: Phil Sinatra

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Creativity is not a talent; it is a way of operating.
author: Robert Greene

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Our understanding of the universe is limited only by our imagination.
author: David Deutsch

quote: Inspiration is perishable, act on it immediately.
author: Navil Ravikant

quote: Be one percent better every day.
author: James Clear

quote: Discipline Equals Freedom.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: You have to cultivate creativity; it doesn't just happen.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: What does the player know? What does the player see? What does the player do?
author: Paul Diefenbach

quote: It's not a challenge of technology. It's a challenge of imagination.
author: Josh Clark

quote: When you design for meaning, good things will happen.
author: Doug Dietz

quote: If I had asked my customers what they wanted, they would have said a faster horse.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Innovation is not about creating something that has never existed. It is about adding value where it did not previously exist.
author: Jared Spool

quote: An idea is the feat of association.
author: Robert Frost

quote: When inspiration does not come to me, I go halfway to meet it.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: In every design discipline, the artist must first acknowledge constraints, and then devise a solution.
author: Andrew Maier

quote: If it is not fun, you are wasting your life.
author: Tom J. Peters

quote: It is not where you take things from, it is where you take things to.
author: Jean Luc Godard

quote: People only see what they are prepared to see.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Minds are like parachutes, they only function when they are open.
author: Thomas Dewar

quote: It's kinda fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Being attached to the way it should work often makes it hard to find the way it actually works.
author: Alex Lindsay

quote: I reject your reality and substitute my own.
author: Adam Savage

quote: Don't make excuses... Make plans!
author: Jervis Thompson

quote: Really early is early, early is on time, on time is late, and late is unacceptable.
author: Troy Finamore

quote: Failure is the information you need to get where you're going.
author: Rick Ruben
